summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey Epstein for shipping services rendered. It details the charges incurred, including transportation and special handling fees, and provides a summary of the shipment's details, including sender and recipient information.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the individual to whom the invoice is addressed, indicating he is the account holder for the FedEx services.

persons.name: Marie Joseph Expert
persons.context: Marie Joseph Expert is listed as the recipient of a shipment sent by Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Eric Gamy
persons.context: Eric Gamy is mentioned as the sender of the package shipped by Jeffrey Epstein.

Eric Gamy is identified as the sender of the package associated with Jeffrey Epstein's account.

events.title: Package Delivered

locations: 457 Madison Ave FL 4, New York, NY 10022-6843
keyFacts: The invoice is dated March 17, 2003, and is for shipping services provided by FedEx.
Total charges for the services rendered amount to USD $29.65.
The package was dropped off on March 12, 2003, and delivered on March 14, 2003.
Jeffrey Epstein is the account holder for the FedEx services used for the shipment.
Marie Joseph Expert is the recipient of the package sent by Epstein.
